The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 December is 1,642,110 (2,917.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 December, there were 110,468 new confirmed cases (196.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 December, there were 85,489 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 29% (24,979 extra cases).
